title: UK Premiere: Only Girl – Feel It (J. Hoskins Remix)
body:
With her second single, _Feel It_, out tomorrow, South London’s **Only Girl** has released this captivating remix, courtesy of **J.**

**Hoskins**. Morphing the vocal section into a deliriously over the top affair, turning twisting the original out of the safety zone, and into more experimental territories. Check out the remix below, alongside the original, both of which are available on [iTunes](https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/feel-it-ep/id909441599) now.
